description: Grippy. Cushioned. Trailblazer. Technical trail workhorses, the men's HOKA Speedgoat 5 trail-running shoes improve on their predecessors with less weight and more traction than ever before.
Road performance meets versatile trail traction in the HOKA Challenger 7 men's trail-running shoes. Sporting updated materials from the ground up, they're lighter than the previous iteration.
Built for lightweight performance, the men's HOKA Torrent 3 trail-running shoes are everything you love about the Torrent 2, just amplified—and they have stripped-back uppers for more breathability.
Looking for shoes that can keep up with you mile after mile? The men's Altra Torin 7 road-running shoes are lightweight, cushioned and engineered to go the distance with you on every run.

product: Altra Olympus 5 Hike Low GTX Hiking Shoes
description: Whether you're out for the day, doing an overnighter or attempting a thru-hike, the men's Altra Olympus 5 Hike Low GTX hiking shoes are up for the adventure with their waterproof construction.
Inspired by the highest mountain in the Alps, the men's Altra Mont Blanc trail-running shoes feature max cushion that's designed for long, hard trail runs.
Even more grip. Even more stability. Even more dynamic uppers. The Salomon Speedcross 5 trail-running shoes for men take rugged off-road performance to another level.
You'll be ready to take off on new adventures, near and far, in these Salomon Sense Ride 4 trail-running shoes. They are comfy and responsive, and built with the soft Optivibe™ cushioning you love.
Take on rugged trails with mud, slick roots and loose rocks in the men's Salomon Thundercross trail-running shoes. They're built to create a smooth ride so you can confidently cruise through runs.
